Text: the rar loving moron strikes again

Ahem ...

"Those RAR loving morons", if you please.

"The Scene" are intransigent on so many fronts.
lol, I agree that it's useless but there's no reason to be that mad about it, it only takes a few seconds to unrar those files.
Get XBMC; it doesn't care if they're multi-part zip/rar, it just plays them.

I can't believe these stupid comments. Although I prefer not to download .rar files, there is a very excellent reason for them which I respect: You can seed this forever and NOT get in trouble, if you delete a single of the .rar files after you've watched it. It's very clever.
